text: Billy Higgins (born 14 August 1945, Bootle, England) is a British karateka. He has an 8th Dan black belt in karate, and is the winner of multiple karate medals including World Karate Championships and is a karate instructor for the Karate Union of Great Britain. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:People from Bootle Category:Living people Category:English male karateka Category:Karate coaches Category:Wadō-ryū practitioners Category:Black English sportspeople Category:Shotokan practitioners Category:Sportspeople from Liverpool Category:British male karateka
title: Billy Higgins (karateka)
